description: Application for a Non-Material Amendment in (S96a) relation to planning permission reference 181104VAR dated 04/03/2019   for ' Application for minor material amendment (S.73) to vary condition 2 of planning permission ref: PP/2015/5938 dated: 04/01/2018 for the 'Change of use from B8 (storage / distribution) to mixed commercial use (A1-A3, B1) to lower ground and ground floor with 39 residential units (7 x studios, 3 x 1 beds, 28 x two beds and 1 x 3 bed) above including construction of two additional storeys to the build, ground floor extension, cantilevered additions to the rear elevation and alterations to elevations'. Amendments seeking relocation of bin storage to basement level, alteration to cycle parking, installation of a lift, relocation of mecha '. Application seeking to include Use Class D2 (gym only) in the description of development
decision_conditions: The development hereby approved shall be retained in accordance with drawing title number (s): Site Location Plan, 1539.PL.003 Rev M1 Proposed Site Block Plan, 1539.PL.100B M1 Proposed Basement Floor Plan, 1539.PL.100G Rev M1 Proposed Ground Floor Plan, 1539.PL.100M Rev M1 Proposed Mezzanine Floor Plan, 1539.PL.100R Rev M1 Proposed Roof Floor Plan, 1539.PL.1001 Rev M1 Proposed First Floor Plan, 1539.PL.1002 Rev M1 Proposed Second Floor Plan, 1539.PL.1003 Rev M1 Proposed Third Floor Plan, 1539.PL.1004 Rev M1 Proposed Fourth Floor Plan, 1539.LO.2000 Rev M1 Proposed East & West Elevations, 1539.PL.2001 Rev M1 Proposed North & South Elevations, 15E9.PL.3001 Rev M1 Proposed Section AA, 1539.PL.3001 Rev M1 Proposed Section BB & CC, 1539.LO.003 Rev 02 As Approved Site Block Plan, 1539E9.LO.100 Rev 09 As Approved Basement Floor Plan, 1539.LO.103 Rev 13 As Approved Ground Floor Plan, 1539.LO.102 Rev 07 As Approved First Floor Plan, 15E9.LO.103 Rev 07 As Approved Second Floor Plan, 15E9.LO.104 Rev 06 Approved Third Floor Plan, 15E9.LO.105 Rev 08 As Approved Fourth Floor Plan, 15E9.LO.107 Rev 09 As Approved Roof Plan, 1539.LO.200 Rev 10 As Approved East & West Elevation, 1539.LO.201 Rev 11 As Approved North & South Elevation, 1539.LO.300 Rev 11 As Approved Section BB, Detail Elevation, Detail Section, 15E9.LO.301 Rev 09 As Approved Section AA.

Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning. | The commercial unit part of the development shall be used as Class Use A1, A2, A3, B1 and D2 (gym) and for no other purpose (including any other purpose in Class D2. of the Schedule to the Town and Country Planning (Use Classes) Order 1987, or in any provision equivalent to that Class in any statutory instrument revoking and re-enacting that Order with or without modification).
REASON: To enable the Local Planning Authority to maintain strict control over the nature of the use, to protect the living conditions of occupiers in the locality.
